page.title: 01COTSWOLDS REVIEW
page.content: The area which we have studied consists of Andoversford,Syreford,Sevenhampton and Whittington,four Cotswold villages.These were small villages originally occupied by farm workers.The villages were mainly built of local Cotswold stone with a school,a village hall and a large manor house where the main landowner once lived.The main employment of the area is farming.Today,most of the local shops and schools have closed and as a result of modern farming methods,very few people work on farms.This means that for most people,work,essential shopping and education after 11 years is in Cheltenham.
